Reviews.Title: “a nice hostel”
Reviews.Author: falfola
Reviews.Content: stayed march 2012 4 nights clean nice hot showers view terrace near major landmarks price enjoyed stay 1 pick airport flight arrived late didnt waiting lost till found hostel finally reception charged pick paid thats flight time arrival send little info else

Reviews.Title: “Dorms are great”
Reviews.Author: UStraveveler
Reviews.Content: price impressed friendliness warmth hostel low season quiet impressed quality beds pillows heating shower bit hit miss sleep location worth effort

Reviews.Title: “Not the best at all !”
Reviews.Author: Nade644
Reviews.Content: booked hostel looking reviews hostelworldcom reviews location awesome cleanliness security roof top terrace etc etc hostel looks perfect continue im picky person am fine simple look hostels safety sleep location perfect cleanliness ok security absolutely none locked door downstairs lock absolutely security locks thats dont fooled rooftop terrace dont advertise worst ive seen dont recommend tons location lot worst hostel staff friendly nice helpful person guy travel agency bit arrogant hey trust wherever organize awesome trip creepy guy reception owner annoying pay check fool total price price time paying decided twice price check pay insist pay write review hostel front wonder reviews forces appropriate sum average hostel recommend sultanahmet

Reviews.Title: “Economic Choice in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: mattkrinbring
Reviews.Content: istanbul hostel stay sultanahmet prices low breakfast sparse id expected cleaned throughout day hostel boasts outstanding price beat value terrible reviewers tried book via email tip hostel hostelworldcom reservations via email subject changes staff simply arrived luckily offseason bet youre light sleeper bring earplugs 1230 quiet hostel city expect street noise picky expecting 5star service hostel setting oneself disappointment dont expect ordinary youll pleasantly surprised terrace view beautiful seasons hotel aya sofia bosporus istanbul hostel delivers exactly promise price wish discovered id paid 60 euro nights substandard 3star hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Istanbul Hostel
HotelInfo.Address: 35 Kutlugun Sok | Sultanahmet, Istanbul, Turkey
